: : Skulletron : :

Skulletron suddenly shudders, and is distracted from wh=
at he is doing.  The Soul Orb's call strongly enters Skulletron's mind.  Af=
ter struggling to make sense of it, it finally quits taking its toll on him=
.  However, in recieving the call, he also had visions.  Visions of the Orb=
s, visions of Empath, and unexplainable visions.  He looks over at Wolfenst=
ein and Tyrael, and then prepares.  He connects his mind with Tyrael's mind=
.  After exploring his mind a little bit, Skulletron gets down to the dirty=
 work.  He starts to send strong images to Tyrael's mind.  Pictures of tran=
sformers battling mindlessly flow into Tyrael's mind.  And then, Skulletron=
 starts to send visions of Tyrael's past into Tyrael's mind.  And then, pic=
tures of Wolfenstein come in.  Wolfenstein and DrillBit, as young bots, pla=
ying like brothers do.  Them having good times together as they get older. =
 And then, DrillBit's death is shown.  And images of Wolfenstein grieving e=
xtremely, so much sadness.  Skulletron then begins to bring out the voices =
and images combined.  Multiple voices in Tyrael's mind, telling him that th=
is battle is pointless, telling him that its murder, telling him about peac=
e, about sadness, and to make an alliance.  The voices and images show happ=
iness among the Tripreds and Predacons together.  All in attempts to sway T=
yrael's emotions and convince him to call this battle off and join for peac=
e and happiness...
